name: ideas_get_view_count
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool trading_view.
Tool description: This API helps you to query for data which is obtained by professional providers who have direct and extensive access to stock quotes, futures, popular indices, Forex, Bitcoin and CFDs to create a financial community site/application, such as : tradingview.com
API description: Fetches the view count for a specific idea post from the Trading View API.

uuid.description: The unique identifier for an idea, as returned by the /ideas/list endpoint.

lang.description: The language code for the response. Default is 'en'.
